description:
Eve and Aoi clash over their shared past as the Doubles championship reaches its end.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Otona no Ego ni Makikomareta Wakamono-tachi no Nidai ni Wataru Suuki na Unmei
The Strange Fates of Two Generations of Young People Who Were Caught Up in the Ego of Adults
大人のエゴに巻き込まれた若者たちの二代に渡る数奇な運命
